scripts.dev: yarn build-dev && concurrently "yarn localdevelopment" "yarn saturn" "yarn pluto" "yarn start"
scripts.dev-nosat: yarn build-dev && concurrently "yarn localdevelopment" "yarn pluto" "yarn start"
scripts.saturn: wait-on http://localhost:5100/ && wait-on tcp:9432 && cd ../saturn/ && KEYCLOAK_CLIENT_SECRET=********** LLM_API_ ./gradlew run
